about_the_game:
Build, run & create your own Skate Shops. Renovate, upgrade and expand your services and create your own shopping empire!
Skate Shop Simulator allows you to create and run your own skate shop network. Start with minor jobs, learn how to repair skate equipment, and design your own clothing line to gain the recognition of your customers.

Fix stuff & try it out by yourself!

Repair skate equipment, including skateboards, roller skates, scooters and bikes. Expand your offer, buy new instruments and perform complicated repairs and equipment replacements. You can also purchase used goods at auctions, restore it and sell it in the store. Become a handyman and build the fame of your services. Oh, and one more thing - you can test your equipment in the form of mini-games!

Sell your products

Make your own choice of what you want to sell in your store. Equip the store with skateboards, bicycles, and a unique clothes collection. Ensure you have the right amount of goods in stock and place orders. You have to check trends and offer clothes and equipment that are currently fashionable. You don't want your clients to wear outdated clothes and ride old bikes, do you?

Buy new Shops…

With an increasing reputation and account balance, you can be tempted to expand your empire. Browse real estate auctions and buy new stores. You don't have to buy ready-made and furnished premises, roll up your sleeves and get to work yourself.

…and renovate them!

Design the interior and renovate it on your own. You can choose from predefined options or grab a broom, brush or hammer yourself to create the shop of your dreams. Buy the right furniture, repair cracked walls, and hire workers for your store. You can also find abandoned and valuable items in godforsaken places and garages!

Create your own brand!

Create your own clothes and shoe line in the editor. You can choose a cut, colour and design an appropriate logo for your clothes. You can then set up your collection in the store and observe the customers’ interest. After purchase, they automatically change their outfit – it’s all about the style!

Key Features
- Go a long and exciting journey, from a DIY enthusiast to a chain store owner;
- Repair various equipment and order goods for your store;
- ride a skateboard, bicycle or scooter in the form of mini-games;
- Full freedom in running stores - choose your assortment and target customers;
- Buy new stores and make complete renovations using numerous tools;
- Design your own clothes. You can choose the cut, colour and design your own logo.
